en: Do ye indeed in silence speak righteousness? Do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?
hmr: Aw rorêltuhai, felna thu maw in hril tak tak? Aw mihriem nauhai, indiktakin maw ro in rêl?

en: Nay, in heart ye work wickedness; Ye weigh out the violence of your hands in the earth.
hmr: Anih, in lungrila chun thil suoltak in thaw hlak a; Hnuoia in kuta thil nunsetaka thaw chu in bûk hlak a.

en: The wicked are estranged from the womb: They go astray as soon as they are born, speaking lies.
hmr: Mi rilohai chu an nu phîng sûnga inthawk hrimin Pathiena inthawka ṭhein an um a; An pieng phingleh khêlthu hrilin an invâk hmang hlak.

en: Their poison is like the poison of a serpent: They are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear,
hmr: An tûr chu rûl tûr ang a na, Rulrîel nasêt, a na hip hlak ang chu an nih.

en: Which hearkeneth not to the voice of charmers, Charming never so wisely.
hmr: Chu chun rûl dawiinvêt theihai râwl chu a ngai nawh a; Ieng anga thiem khawmin dawi hai sien khawm.

en: Break their teeth, O God, in their mouth: Break out the great teeth of the young lions, O Jehovah.
hmr: Aw Pathien, an baua chun an hahai chu suktlam la, Aw LALPA, sakeibaknei vânglaihai ha lientak takhai chu khel dawk la,

en: Let them melt away as water that runneth apace: When he aimeth his arrows, let them be as though they were cut off.
hmr: Anni chu tui hrâttaka luong angin intui hmang hai sienla, A thalhai a tinin, sât fik angin um pei raw hai se.

en: Let them be as a snail which melteth and passeth away, Like the untimely birth of a woman, that hath not seen the sun.
hmr: Kawngkawrawi, intui a, bo el hlak ang hi ni sienla: A hun nawha nuhmei nau nei, nisa hmêl hrim hrim hmu lo ang hi ni raw se.

en: Before your pots can feel the thorns, He will take them away with a whirlwind, the green and the burning alike.
hmr: In bêlhai chun hling thing lum a hriet hma khawmin: Ama chun thlivirin la hmang a ta, A hring le a kâng lai khawm.

en: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: He shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked;
hmr: Mi fel chun phubalâkna chu a hmuin lâwm a ta, Mi rilo thisena chun a ke chu sâwp a tih.

en: So that men shall say, Verily there is a reward for the righteous: Verily there is a God that judgeth in the earth.
hmr: Chuongchun, mihaiin, “Mi fel ta ding chun lâwmman a lo um tak tak a; Hnuoia hin rorêltu Pathien a lo um tak tak a ni hi,” tîng an tih.
